summary.overview: This JCL performs daily transaction processing by extracting card transactions from backup data for a specific date (2022-06-02) and creating a sorted daily transaction file. The process filters transactions by processing date and sorts them by card number for daily reporting and analysis purposes.
business_functions: Extract card transactions from backup dataset for specific processing date (2022-06-02)
Filter transaction records to include only those processed on the target date
Sort filtered transactions in ascending order by card number
Generate daily transaction file for reporting and analysis

SORTTEST.jcl.program_overview: IBM Sort Utility - Filters and sorts card transaction records by date and card number

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Backup Records (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.BKUP)
datasource_summary.function: Input dataset containing transaction backup records used as source data for sorting and filtering operations

datasource_summary.name: Daily Transaction Records (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.DALY)
datasource_summary.function: Output dataset for daily transaction records containing sorted transaction records filtered by processing date
